title: Mariko Bronson
text:
Welcome!
My name is Mariko, and I’ll be graduating UCSB with a B.S. in Environmental Studies. This is my personal website where I’ll be sharing some of my interests! Above, you can access my Github or my contact information.

title: About Me
text:
About this site
I grew up in Tokyo, Japan, and moved to California when I was 6 years old. I always planned on becoming a veterinarian, but in high school I took AP Environmental Science and immediately changed my trajectory. I’ll be spending this upcoming fall in Australia doing marine biology and ecology fieldwork, and am especially excited to see their unique stick insects and the Great Barrier Reef. Aside from ecology, my core interests include clean energy, sustainable innovations, urban planning, and soil science.
